member.name: M:NameGeneratorLib.NameGen.GetName(NameGeneratorLib.NameGen.NAME_OPTION,NameGeneratorLib.NameGen.NAME_GENDER)
member.summary: Retrieves a random name with options for the the kind of name to retrieve.
member.param: Determines if a first name, surname, or full name is returned.
Determines if the name should be female, male, or either.

member.name: M:NameGeneratorLib.NameGen.GetResourceEntry(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a line from the embedded resource file and returns its contents in string form.
member.param: The starting line to begin reading from.
The line to stop reading at.
The number of lines to read.
member.returns: a single string line from the resource
